metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Wall and near HAG SurvivorsFist Nephel [NEW NAME] overseeing scanning of civilians

0.speaker: Fist Nephel
0.text: These citizens need to be evaluated. I'm sure this Watcher will sort itself out soon and we can all get on with it.

1.speaker: Fist Nephel
1.text: Be patient while these citizens are evaluated. This is all routine - make no sudden moves.
